item.title: Guide To Zones In Google Tag Manager 360
item.description: Last updated 13 March 2024: Clarified that you can add a trigger like Initialization â€“ All Pages as a Custom Evaluation to have the Zone an earlier set page state. Google Tag Manager supports loading multiple containers on the same page. It’s useful if you have multiple companies or organizations working on the same site, but for one reason or another (e.g. governance) you want to restrict access to your main container.
